summary: Executive profile: Marketing and sales executive with extensive experience in direct sales, brand management, and revenue growth across national accounts. Creative, results-oriented leader skilled at problem solving, team development, and delivering strategic initiatives in high-pressure environments.

experience.title: Business Development Manager/Program Director
experience.description: Designed and implemented strategic marketing initiative for First Interstate Bank entitled 'Bank of the Future.' Market share and revenue grew by over 300% and the program, including the training of bank employees in direct sales, was rolled out nationally. Developed sales training protocols for ADP's new 'P.C. Payroll' product line which dominated the marketplace. Recruited, trained and managed an agent sales force for AT&T's GBS Division which grew to in excess of $250 million in revenue per year. Built a successful telecommunications company that grew to 30+ employees and $5 million in annual revenue. Responsible for all aspects of the organization including direct sales.

experience.title: Program Director
experience.description: Oversaw program direction and coordination for the organization.

experience.title: President/CEO
experience.description: Chief Executive Officer of a medium-size telecommunications corporation. Managed day-to-day operations and long-term strategy; conducted cost, schedule, contract performance, variance and risk analysis; drafted business plans and budgets; coached 38 staff; conducted all sales training; established knowledge-sharing processes; increased monthly sales; managed budgets; identified strategic partnerships; expanded revenue; led marketing and client relationship activities.

experience.title: Senior Territorial Manager
experience.description: Spearheaded an Agent Program resulting in a 300% increase in revenue. Led cross-selling/up-selling initiatives; trained sales agents; prepared performance updates and quarterly business reviews; monitored market conditions and competitor activity.

experience.title: District Manager
experience.description: Led sales teams, expanded customer base, and managed district operations; achieved revenue growth and strengthened customer relationships.

experience.title: Credit/Marketing Manager V.P
experience.description: Managed credit and marketing responsibilities; oversaw strategic initiatives and revenue growth.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Business Administration
